desc: I'm a bigender author who loves to write about the future of technology and how it will impact our lives. I'm also a big fan of the outdoors and love to go hiking and camping whenever I can. I'm always looking for new and exciting adventures to go on, and I'm excited to share them with you through my writing. I hope you enjoy reading my work as much as I enjoy writing it!
